column5: The check in the mail!! 269 days, Lady Evelyn

Presently sitting out a weather delay on Little Vermilion Lake, north of Red Lake, ON. Will be back a few days before the 3rd Saturday in May 2012. Don't even discuss it with the outfitter, just do it. Early next May we'll discuss a time for flying in.No problems with the delay. Let's fly when it's safe.

Only 254 days until we head North to Goose Bay Camp on the NW end of Lac Seul. Deposit sent, boat upgrade and cabin will be waiting for us. A room at the Rainbow Hotel in Fort Frances for the Friday night crossing is all set to go as well!
Rainbow Hotel, is that the old Voyager?

Pikeslayer8, according to thier website, they have been in business since 1958. It is past the AdvetureInn on Kingshwy west. A small quiet place to try to sleep when your dreaming of facing down the tasty walleye! Our room last year had been renovated last winter, very nice and clean, and for the two of us, about $35 per person. We did head down to the AdventureInn for a "few" beers, just to relax so we could sleep!? http://www.rainbowmotel.ca/Last June we had a 10 min wait at the border on Friday night, most of the lodging in I Falls looked full of boats and trucks waiting to cross Saturday no thanks! We stopped for dinner in I Falls, but we'll pass on the Saturday wait!
the voyager is downtown fort frances pikeslayer.the rainbow is just across from wal-mart, on the west side of town.Then there is the bay view, right beside can-op in the east end of town
don,t stay at the bay view. the rainbow is good and clean and the rates are good. stayed there myself for months.
We are going to Sioux Lookout in June and Red Lake in September. We are all excited for our 2012 adventures. Have a great yearThank you,Larry Mac
I'm going to Lac Seul the last week of July and the first week of August.I may also stay the second week of August also.I'm trying to talk my buddy into a 3 week trip.
